projects.title: This Website
projects.description: A personal portfolio website built with React, TypeScript, and Sass. It showcases my projects and skills.

projects.title: Crab Go Grab
projects.description: An online multiplayer game where players can guess an outcome. Uses websockets with React and Spring Boot.

projects.title: Employee Creator
projects.description: Full stack application using Redux and Spring Boot. Allows the client to modify employee data stored in a relational database.

projects.title: FakeOS
projects.description: A mock replication of Windows XP, built with React. Features a taskbar, start menu, and application.

projects.title: Postcode viewer
projects.description: A full stack application in React and Spring Boot that allows users to view postcode data, and for authorised users to modify postcode data. Was created to learn about authentication.

projects.title: Morse Code Translator
projects.description: A web application that allows translation from alpha-numeric characters to Morse code and binary. Built with Javascript.

projects.title: Minesweeper
projects.description: A terminal-based version of the classic Minesweeper game. Built with Java.
